Description: Pharmacy Times, in an article from 2017, states that Singulair could help prevent viral pneumonia with influenza and could prevent the infection of alveolar cells deep in the LRT. Would this hold true with Coronavirus? Thank you and God Bless!
DialogueText:
Patient:
Pharmacy Times, in an article from 2017, states that Singulair could help prevent viral pneumonia with influenza and could prevent the infection of alveolar cells deep in the LRT. Would this hold true with Coronavirus? Thank you and God Bless!
Doctor:
